<div class = "textspace mt-8">
<p class = "">Hypertram 4000: World Tour is an alt-control tram arcade game created for the 2025 Indie City All Stars game jam. Inspired by H2Overdrive and Densha de Go this game creates a time-attack style arcade experience in its three game modes: Precise Stop, Street Crossing, and Bowling!</p>
<p class = "">Hypertram 4000: World Tour was selected by judges as a finalist. It was shown at <a href="https://youtu.be/tM9gXB27pJ4?si=-NnXwLwkIOwAzm7X&t=37" class="highlight underline">Indie City Games' July showcase</a> in Chicago where it was played by over a hundred attendees.</p>
</div>

<div class="relative w-full h-0 pb-[56.25%]">
<iframe class="absolute top-0 left-0 w-full h-full" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tiBWMEIYUJs?si=3_4IMvqsp7Vxh6r8" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
</div>

<div class = "textspace-no-margin my-8">
<p>As a <span class = "highlight">Project Lead</span> I was responsible for:</p>
<ul class = "list-disc ml-4">
    <li>Origional concept of the game, putting a team together, and facilitating communication on deliverables.</li>
    <li>Physical design and manufaturing of the game's controller.</li>
    <li>Creating an art bible and refernce documentation to communicate artistic style and vision.</li>
    <li>Providing feedback on iterations from the art team, and implementing all art in game.</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class = "textspace-no-margin my-8">
<p>As a <span class = "highlight">Game Designer</span> I was responsible for:</p>
<ul class = "list-disc ml-4">
    <li>Design and concept of all three minigames.</li>
    <li>Adjusting minigames according to playtester feedback.</li>
    <li>Tuning and balancing to make sure that scoring system allows both casual play and mastery.</li>
</ul>
</div>

<div class = "textspace-no-margin my-8">
<p>As a <span class = "highlight">Programmer</span> I was responsible for:</p>
<ul class = "list-disc ml-4">
    <li>Programming of all gameplay elements, including the game's unique needs relating to physics and sequencing.</li>
    <li>Implementation of all UI, audio, and easter eggs.</li>
    <li>Creating system to read input from the physical controller's arduino and pass that to Unity.</li>
</ul>
</div>
